replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
z13145555 发表于 2019-7-3 16:45
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Daisy, daisy...
打开服务器文件夹 config/ 中的文件 forge.cfg ，将
B:removeErroringEntities=false
B:removeErroringTileEntities=false复制代码
改为
B:removeErroringEntities=true
B:removeErroringTileEntities=true复制代码

replies.author: z13145555
replies.txt_content:

改为

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
z13145555 发表于 2019-7-3 16:50
麻烦您说下这什么情况
简单来说，是这个实体引发了崩溃，
- Entity being ticked --
Details:
        Entity Type: customnpcs.CustomNpc (noppes.npcs.entity.EntityCustomNpc)
        Entity ID: 20324
        Entity Name: 圣魂兵
        Entity's Exact location: 554.83, 51.00, 3043.13
        Entity's Block location: World: (554,51,3043), Chunk: (at 10,3,3 in 34,190; contains blocks 544,0,3040 to 559,255,3055), Region: (1,5; contains chunks 32,160 to 63,191, blocks 512,0,2560 to 1023,255,3071)
        Entity's Momentum: 0.00, -0.08, 0.00
Stacktrace:
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72939_s(World.java:2423)
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72939_s(WorldServer.java:633)
复制代码
而上面的选项，是打开移除错误实体，就能进入服务器了

replies.author: z13145555
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-7-3 16:51
简单来说，是这个实体引发了崩溃，

而上面的选项，是打开移除错误实体，就能进入服务器了 ...
感谢，能否给个联系方式，以后好联系
